name: 1000 Point Shmup
description:
A shoot-em-up where you can get 1000 points and NO MORE! Do not do too well or the gameshow host will get angry and blow you up. Created for the Spring 2022 Buddy Jam.

Created by: 

  • Stef - Coder
  • Rejean Lagasse - Game Design
  • Jonathan W - Narrative Design
  • Grandle Jams - Music & Sound Effects
  • Ahihi - Art
  • Playimu - Art
